entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 PM PDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 04:00 AM PDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 20 March 2023
